name: SocialIsolation
title: Social Isolation
description: Determination of whether the person has social interactions with family, friends or colleagues or experiences social isolation.  (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Social Isolation.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person has social interactions with family, friends or colleagues or experiences social isolation. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Social Isolation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Social Isolation.)
